message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $10,250?  I'm confident this product will be worth that to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I believe $10,000 would be a fair price for the product considering its value. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
